main.name: Tim Dillon
main.description: I recently graduated from Western Governors University in the US with a Bachelors of Science in Software Development. I have experience with Java making desktop apps using JavaFX as well as using Spring Boot for web apps
main.bio: The majority of my experience so far has been with Java. I am most interested in growing as a backend developer, creating web apps and microservices, but I'm always open to new adventures. When I'm not coding I play soccer, go mountain climbing, or play with my 2 dogs.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me and connect

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Software Development
education.description: Took classes in software development, design and testing. Coursework also include database management, networking and project management.

work.title: LQA Tester
work.description: Tested video games for bugs, reported testing results and bugs to clients. Performed regression testing on bug fixes.

projects.title: Grocery List
projects.category: Grocery list app made with React and Spring Boot
